detaileddescription.para: The number of LIN interfaces used in the project can be configured with preprocessor directives. The automatically generated LIN configuration file will define the number of LIN interfaces. Other LIN_Com driver components (LIN FlexDriver LLD and LIN Integration CDD) will use the #ifdef SCI[x]_USED directive in this scope. Here [x] represents the interface identifier: starts from 0 and goes till LIN_IFC_NR_MAX - defined also in the configuration files.
